p:
The numbers of atomic sites in the commensurate long-period structure with an arbitrary M value can be expressed as a function of M:
Fe sites comprising the FeAl 2 framework: 4M
Al sites comprising the FeAl 2 framework: 8M
c-axis chain sites equivalent to Al2 sites in the parent orthorhombic structure: M +Â 1
c-axis chain sites equivalent to Al3 sites in the parent orthorhombic structure: 2(M-1)
